name: Chroma Blast (itch) (Jezrien)
description:
Objective: Get to the Stargate!

Move with WASD. Fire with Spacebar. Switch beams with arrow keys. Hit Escape to pause the game (and see more detailed controls).

Keep an eye on the UI element in the lower right.

Animated elements:
      Arm cannon - three idle animations, three fire animations (one for each colour)
      Doors - open and close animations

Game by JesseRubin
